description: Table for cellular therapy episode information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: TX_DISCHARGE_DT
columns.description: Date transplant patient is discharged.

columns.name: TX_EVAL_DT
columns.description: The start date of the transplant evaluation.

columns.name: TX_REV_DT
columns.description: Stores the date when the transplant case was reviewed by the evaluation committee.

columns.name: TX_EPSD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is a donor or a recipient for the transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Donor


Recipient

columns.name: ADMISSION_DT
columns.description: Date of the admission for the transplant.

columns.name: TX_DT
columns.description: Stores the date of the infusion.

columns.name: MOB_START_DT
columns.description: The start date of the process to increase the number of immature hematopoietic cells in the blood.

columns.name: CND_START_DT
columns.description: The start date of the regimen that will eliminate the individual's ability to make blood cells.

columns.name: HCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the hematopoietic cell transplantation type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Autologous


Allogeneic

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the blood and marrow transplant diagnosis


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Acute Myelogenous Leukemia 


Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia


Other Acute Leukemia


Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia


Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia 


Myelodysplastic/Myeloproliferative Diseases


Other Leukemia


Hodgkin Lymphoma


Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma


Multiple Myeloma


Other Plasma Cell Disorder


Germ Cell Tumor


Solid Tumor


Amyloidosis


Severe Aplastic Anemia


Inherited Abnormalities of Erythrocyte Differentiation or Function


Disorders of Immune System


Inherited Abnormalities of Platelets


Inherited Disorders of Metabolism


Histiocytic Disorders


Autoimmune Diseases


Other Disease


Acute Leukemia of Ambiguous Lineage and Other Myeloid Neoplasms


Inherited Bone Marrow Failure Syndromes


Hemoglobinopathies


Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria


Tolerance Induction Associated with Solid Organ Transplant


Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa

columns.name: CELL_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the planned blood and marrow transplant product type. The product type is the source of the cells used in treatment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Marrow


Peripheral blood stem cells


Umbilical cord blood


Multiple umbilical cord blood


Amniotic fluid


Natural killer (NK cells)


Donor lymphocyte infusions


Mesenchymal stem cells


Other cells

columns.name: DONOR_SELECTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The donor's selection status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Selected for Donation


Deferred

columns.name: DONOR_ELIGIBILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The donor's eligibility.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Eligible


Ineligible


Incomplete

columns.name: DONOR_RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The donor's relationship to the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Aunt


Cousin


Father


Fraternal Twin


Half-sibling


Maternal Aunt


Maternal Cousin


Maternal Uncle


Mother


Other Biological Relative


Other Relative


Parent


Paternal Aunt


Paternal Cousin


Paternal Uncle


Child


Sibling


Identical Twin


Uncle


Unrelated

columns.name: DONOR_PREGNANCIES_NUM
columns.description: The number of pregnancies the donor had at time of collection.

columns.name: BMT_CARE_PATH_ID
columns.description: The ID of the child care path associated with this clinical episode.

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_NUM
columns.description: Stores the transplant number.

columns.name: DONOR_SUITABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The donor suitability.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Suitable


Unsuitable

columns.name: DONOR_AVAILABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The donor's availability for transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Available


Unavailable


Temporarily Unavailable

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_OTHER
columns.description: This diagnosis details when the user selects "other" as the diagnosis.

columns.name: CELL_PRODUCT_OTHER
columns.description: This product details when the user selects "other" as the product type.

columns.name: CURRENT_PHASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current stage of the transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Evaluation


Waitlist


Admitted for Transplant


Transplanted

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of the current stage of the transplant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Internal Hold


Declined


Approved


Removed


Denied Follow-up


Denied Not Followed


Inactive


Deferred


Deferred Follow-up


Deferred Not Followed


Ineligible


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Approved for Listing


Approved for Live Donor Only


Active Follow-up


Reporting Follow-up Only


Not Followed

columns.name: EPISODE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The episode note ID

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_DATE
columns.description: Date of the last transplant stage update.

columns.name: EPISODE_RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The episode status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: BMT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the blood and marrow transplant plan.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_DAY_0_DATE
columns.description: The planned or actual Day 0 for the recipient to whom this patient is donating cells.

columns.name: DNR_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this donor is related to the potential recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: BMT_DNR_WORKUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the donor is the primary donor for workup, the backup donor, or neither


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Backup

columns.name: BMT_DEFERRAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Why the donor is deferred


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other

columns.name: BMT_DEFERRAL_OTHER
columns.description: Free text entry for why the donor is deferred

columns.name: ANC_OVRIDE_DATE
columns.description: Stores override absolute neutrophil count recovery date

columns.name: ANC_NO_REC_YN
columns.description:
Stores an override to indicate explicitly that the absolute neutrophil count did not recover.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DNR_RELATED_YN

columns.name: PLT_OVRIDE_DATE
columns.description: Stores override platelet recovery date

columns.name: PLT_NO_REC_YN
columns.description:
Stores an override to indicate explicitly that the platelet count did not recover.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DNR_RELATED_YN

columns.name: RECIPIENT_IDENT
columns.description: The ID of the recipient to whom this patient is donating cells. Can hold a CRID. Valid values for an EPT IIT for ICX 110 for subject Recipient are valid values for this item. Note that this item is only used for donor episodes where the recipient is anonymous/unknown.

columns.name: GVHD_MATCH_GRADE
columns.description: The overall graft-versus-host HLA match grade between a BMT donor and their intended recipient.

columns.name: HVG_MATCH_GRADE
columns.description: The overall host-versus-graft HLA match grade between a BMT donor and their intended recipient.

columns.name: HLA_DP_MATCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The match evaluation for the HLA DP results of the donor and recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Match


Permissive Mismatch


Non-Permissive Mismatch
